about_the_game:
A One-Button Butt Clenching Bullet Hell

WE ARE DAMN SURE, YOU HAVE NEVER PLAYED A GAME LIKE THIS EVER!!

It's so awesome no one has any IDEA how to advertise it! BUT EVERYONE LOVES IT!!

Have you seen the game footage?!

WHAT THE HECK EVEN IS THIS?!

It's an A**HOLE type of game!

It's a KUSOGE!
It means sh**ty crappy game in Japanese!
It's kusoge in the best way possible! It that makes you laugh while you are challenged!
It's a real roller coaster of emotion!

Dont get intimidated! Cause its not as hard as it looks. 💓

Cause I'll hold your hand bro~
🧑‍🤝‍🧑"I love you, no homo bro." 🤝
Thank you bb.. Oh yeah just friends...
Oh no bro...

It's difficult but its fair and not punishing! Even your mama likes it!

This Puzzling One-Button Bullet-Hell was made to be enjoyed by CASUALS and hardcores!
With unlimited life and puzzle like structure.
This game was enjoyed by my MOM and your momma alike.

So whats your excuse?!

You can play up to FOUR PLAYERS COOP!

Play with your friends!
It's so freakin' fun playing coop with your friends!
You cheer for them to win to help revive you while your dead.
And you get revived and you got drunk from the beer you just had in real life.
And you shout like an idiot as you couldnt find your character.
Ahh good times.

Good Knight was made to help you become a better person!

Good Knight is a Fan Favorite game within the Philippines streamer, content creators, PHVtuber, Vtuber, gamedev, and FGC community!
It even got ̶D̶e̶a̶t̶h̶ ̶I̶n̶s̶u̶l̶t̶s̶.. Life Advices! Learn through your failures. Your mistakes smaller than you think~

We really poured our heart in this game. We love it and hope you do too!

The one button mechanic was made to help create a one of a kind game, as well as trying to simplify the bullet hell and shoot em up high level mechanics to any kind of player.
As a result we fused shooter, rhythm, arcade, retro, and more in this Dante's inferno meets Philippine Horror bullet-hell.
It known to be the one of the most handcrafted, polished and finely detailed three-man indie game in existence despite being in early access.

A Loveletter to Video Games and Philippines' Culture

Good Knight is made from the Philippines thus is full of local monsters, mythology, and history you have to seen in any video game.
Fight PHILIPPINE HORRORS and history in this one-of-a-kind game!
The story of Good Knight hopes to show everything cool and loveable about our culture.
The lore is well researched as it was inspired by Filipino history, literature, precolonial and postcolonial culture.
We had our university scholar friends help us! And of course ourselves just by loving it!
We cant also wait to know if you figure out the small bits and pieces of literature, games, and music we added to express our love to the things we adore!

Polished and handcrafted to perfection!

For the patterns alone it took Alex, takes TWO HOURS to make SIX SECONDS of true hell's gameplay in this more than EIGHT HOURS game.
And more than that Zaid and Ramon took so much time to work on the art and music of the game!
We're just a team of three with tons of help from our assistants and community.
So please love us~ 💓

Listen to this guy and just do it bro! 🤝

OH YOU CAN ALSO PLAY AS A CHICKEN!!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains stylish abstract blood, hack slash style violence, demonic world, and naked demon with a doll anatomy.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Atom x7 Z8750 @ 1.60 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 405
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: YOOO! School took your wallet? Vtubers took your wallet? Your wallet took your wallet?! SAY NO MORE! WE GOT YOUR BACK HOMIE! Potatos system has potato mode than can work with cpu that watches paint dry. <3 Works 60fps on 320x240px. We will optimize it more so itll work on older specs, and better resolution.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9300H @ 2.40GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Does your PC got RGB?! PSU got RGB?! Love mouses that look like christmas lights?! ME TOO!! Even I got rgb installed on my girlfiend, she's water cooled to her teeth! But dont worry your pc doesnt even need to be military grade to play GK to its full! It doesnt have to be RTX that goes bbrrt brrt brrt, shoots out crypto, to get 60FPS Max graphics. But its okay if its as strong as yo momma.

name: Good Knight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7
  • Processor: Intel Atom x7 Z8750 @ 1.60 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 405
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: YOOO! School took your wallet? Vtubers took your wallet? Your wallet took your wallet?! SAY NO MORE! WE GOT YOUR BACK HOMIE! Potatos system has potato mode than can work with cpu that watches paint dry. <3 Works 60fps on 320x240px. We will optimize it more so itll work on older specs, and better resolution.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9300H @ 2.40GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Does your PC got RGB?! PSU got RGB?! Love mouses that look like christmas lights?! ME TOO!! Even I got rgb installed on my girlfiend, she's water cooled to her teeth! But dont worry your pc doesnt even need to be military grade to play GK to its full! It doesnt have to be RTX that goes bbrrt brrt brrt, shoots out crypto, to get 60FPS Max graphics. But its okay if its as strong as yo momma.

reviews:
“This game here is a sleeper hit! And if doesnt blow up, you can color me surprised! [This is the perfect example of innovative amazing indie games]”
Must Buy – Shmup Junkie - Top NEW and Upcoming Games 2021 Update

“Who could have known filipino mythology is soo fucking RAD!”
Must Buy – Even More Steam Shmups - The Bone Zone

“Good Knight is steeped in Filipino mythos. That’s unique for video games, let alone a traditionally-leaning shooter.”
Recommend – Forbes
short_description: Embark on an exhilarating journey through the depths of Filipino mythology in this Buttclenching One-Button Bullet-Hell. Test yourself through a relentless onslaught of bullets and beautiful patterns. Experience the intense action and headbanging soundtrack in this must-play game for all indie fans!
